data.name: Devil May Cry 5 Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
"Bang! Bang! Bang! Pull my Devil Trigger! ♪" You've got the Smokin' Sexy Stylish game, now jam along to the Smokin' Sexy Stylish soundtrack of Devil May Cry 5 wherever you go!

The 288+ minute soundtrack has been re-authored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 1790 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2090 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: MP3 (V0) + AAC (VBR) / FLAC (16-bit)
